alert.note: Alert for Berks; Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Upper Bucks; Western Chester; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 7:39AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN BERKS...MONTGOMERY... CENTRAL BUCKS AND NORTHEASTERN CHESTER COUNTIES... At 736 AM EST, a snow shower was located along a line extending from near Souderton to Royersford to near Glenmoore. Movement was east at 20 mph. Light snow may accumulate on bridges and over passes and other elevated surfaces, creating slippery conditions. Locations impacted include... Norristown, Pottstown, Phoenixville, Lansdale, West Norriton, East Norriton, Perkasie, Doylestown, Downingtown, Conshohocken, Souderton, Ambler, Birdsboro, Collegeville, Royersford, Chalfont, Trappe, Hatfield, Honey Brook, and Schwenksville. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 296 and 337. Northeast Extension between mile markers 21 and 41. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 327 and 330. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 17 and 19. Interstate 176 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 1 and 9. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Berks; Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Upper Bucks; Western Chester; Western Montgomery
